a_5.formal problem:
theorem
fixes x :: real and P Q R :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. P x = (2 * x - 5) * (x + 7)"
and h1 : "\<forall> x. Q x = (x + 5) * (2 * x - 1)"
and h2 : "\<forall> x. R x = P x - Q x"
shows  "R x = -30"
a_5.formal solution:
(* ### Problem

 *)

assumes h0 : "\<forall> x. P x = (2 * x - 5) * (x + 7)"
and h1 : "\<forall> x. Q x = (x + 5) * (2 * x - 1)"

shows  "R x = -30"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
